message.body: Baby girl we were going to test him regardless... there were a couple of times he looked like he smoked when he came home. We aren't idiots...
I didn't tell him anything about what we heard... the first day he asked to move in I told him the #1 rule was no drugd. He said ok and that he stopped smoking....
okay! please dont get me involved
Tonight I told him I was doing a random test just bec I was serious about the no drugs rule. It had nothing to do with what dawn said.
